title: Install and Uninstall Applications
answer:
1. SettingsàSecurityàUnknown sources.

2. Download APK from internet or copy source to local memory.

l  Click the application to install.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151008115836997001.png)  
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151008115845563001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151008115905141001.png)  

l  Click the application to Uninstall.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20151008115929476001.png)
